short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embed stats in your favorite basketball news stories

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See WAR stats embedded right next to NBA players' names as you read sports news online. Currently supports ESPN.com, The Athletic, and Sports Illustrated.

WAR ("Wins Above Replacement") is a statistic that tries to measure a player's total contributions to their team in one hard number. How many more wins did the Warriors have because Stephen Curry was playing instead of an average player? That's the number Warhead NBA shows you, to help you tell the good from the best, the bad from the ugly.

Specifically, the number shown is a player's average WAR per season over their career.

Check out the "Warhead Baseball" extension for baseball stats!
